name: Forty-Eight: Part II (2013)
description:
'Forty-Eight: Part II' is the 6th Dlugokecki album. This is the second part of our '48 Trilogy' as I am a big fan of trilogies - Star Wars, Back to the Future and Karate Kid being the best! This piano driven album was again written within a 48 hour limit, however, this time we have spent a little more time recording as we enjoy it too much. This album charts the months of January to August this year, another massive personal album for me and one I'm extremely happy with! The 8 song album includes our new single 'We are loved' - which was mixed and mastered by Glen Nichols (Save My Soul/Let this be Right). It also includes a duet with Charley Macaulay (Acid Jazz) and the new single 'No Good'. The album was produced by Tim Jackson. 

I hope you enjoy it as much as I have enjoyed writing it - Ben Dlugokecki. 

Forty-Eight: Part II
by Dlugokecki

Sleepwalker
We are Loved
U & Me & A & E
No Good
The Payout
Take it Easy
What are you Waiting for?
Windmill

name: Forty-Eight (2012)
description:
‘Forty-Eight’ is 11 songs written over the 3-month period of July to September 2012 to reflect on the massive changes in my life.  Written with tears, boredom, frustration, anger and love it really is a document of where I have been, and where I am going. This is completely the most personal album I have ever written. I hope over people will get something out of it, or can take some understanding from the lyrics. 

Instead of sitting on these songs for years the band and I decided to take a big gamble and do something we have never done before. We have set ourselves only 48 hours to record the songs. This will be done over the next month, and will hopefully generate the rawness I believe these 11 songs hold.  

- Ben Dlugokecki

Forty Eight
By Dlugokecki

Love Will Always Win 
Don’t Burn Your Bridges Ben 
Forty-Eight
The One That Got Away
How Do You Solve A Problem Like Us? 
Catapult
The Game
Busy Keeping Busy
Hold me Down 
The Wall
Two Houses

name: Complete Dlugokecki 2000-2012 (2012)
description:
This is a limited edition CD set. Only 500 copies will be made. Each copy is signed. 

A 2-Disc Set (1 CD and 1 MP3 CD) spanning 12 years of Dlugokecki music, and includes all their major songs together for the first time. The set contains a 'Best of Dlugokecki' audio CD and a 133 Track MP3 CD that includes every Dlugokecki recording between 2000-2012 that is half-decent! Also, for the first time there is a collection of 33 Rarities alongside extended editions of 'Let This Be Right' and 'Before the Storm'. 

The MP3 CD includes:

10 Years of Dlugokecki   (2010)
Live From The USA    (2009)
Let This Be Right - Complete Edition   (2008)
Before The Storm - Complete Edition  (2006)
Rarites  (2000-2012)
Selected Works (2000-2003)

The 'Best of Dlugokecki' audio CD includes:

1. Save My Soul
2. Too Many Borders
3. Let This Be Right
4. Set In Stone
5. Right Time / Wrong Time
6. Strobe Light
7. A Heaven To Believe In
8. Arrive Like The Tide
9. Belted In Safely
10. Calm Before The Storm
11. Barricades
12. Hope Song
13. Shine On
14. Sold Out
15. Perfectionistical
16. Stolen
17. Piano Girl Plays
18.Guide
19. Clog Up The System

name: Putting The Tracks in Front of the Train (2012)
description:
The long-awaited debut studio album from Southampton band 'Dlugokecki'. 

1. Impossible Speeds
2. You Don't Own Me
3. Putting the Tracks in Front of the Train
4. Blank Page
5. Firelighter
6. Lifeboat
7. The Healer
8. Stand in Front of the Tank
9. Insecure
10. All Stations
